titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for eating disorders treatment for members and certain former members of the uninformed services, and dependents of such members, and for other purposes.

To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for eating disorders treatment for members and certain former members of the uninformed services, and dependents of such members, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
